about.title: Counselor Montaser Haridy
about.subtitle: Elite Lawyer
about.description: One of the most prominent lawyers in Egypt and the Arab world, specializing in high-profile, sensitive cases requiring absolute confidentiality.
about.experience: With over 15 years of experience and a 95%+ success rate across 1000+ cases, Counselor Montaser Haridy has established himself as the go-to legal expert for celebrities, politicians, and business leaders.
about.vip_title: Lawyer for Stars, Politicians & Business Leaders
about.vip_description: Renowned for exceptional expertise in handling sensitive high-profile public cases and public figures with absolute confidentiality

hero.title: Counselor Montaser Haridy
hero.subtitle: Elite Lawyer - Voice of Law for Stars, Politicians & Business Leaders
hero.description: Recognized by the legal and media community as one of the most prominent lawyers in Egypt and the Arab world, renowned for exceptional expertise in handling sensitive high-profile cases.

background.title: Professional Background
background.intro: Counselor Montaser Haridy has built a distinguished career representing high-profile clients across the Middle East and beyond. With offices in Egypt, Saudi Arabia, and the UAE, he provides comprehensive legal services with an emphasis on confidentiality and results.
background.experience: His expertise spans criminal defense, corporate law, international cases, and foreign residency matters. Having successfully handled over 1,000 cases with a 95%+ success rate, Counselor Haridy has become the trusted legal advisor for celebrities, politicians, and business leaders throughout the region.
background.vision: To be at the forefront of leading law firms in the Arab world, and the destination for elite investors and business leaders seeking effective legal and financial support in the Middle East, while maintaining professional values and complete confidentiality.

overview.description: Expert representation in all types of legal cases with exceptional expertise and distinguished legal representation across all court levels.
overview.coverage: In a world full of legal complexities, litigation management within Counselor Montaser Haridy's office stands out as one of the strongest specialized departments in representing individuals and companies before all levels of courts in Egypt, Saudi Arabia, and the UAE.

hero.title: Corporate Services
hero.subtitle: From Idea to Legal Entity - Your Partners in Success
hero.description: Complete business formation and management services with international expertise across Egypt, Saudi Arabia, and UAE. We don't just establish companies; we build investments on solid ground.

overview.title: Comprehensive Corporate Solutions
overview.description: In light of the expansion of local and regional investment, the Corporate Services department within Counselor Montaser Haridy's office has emerged as one of the strongest legal departments specialized in establishing and developing commercial and investment entities according to the highest standards of legal accuracy and transparency.

egypt.title: Egypt Corporate Services
items: Company formation (all types: single person, LLC, joint stock)
Legal amendments (adding partners, changing activities, capital modifications)
Commercial registry and tax card extraction
Registration of incorporation contracts and bylaws
Establishment of non-profit associations and foundations

Local agency and legal sponsorship services

post_formation.title: Post-Formation Services
items: Corporate tax and annual reports follow-up

residency.title: Foreign Residency
residency.description: 500+ successful residency cases across 16+ countries for international clients

hero.title: Foreign Residency Services
hero.subtitle: International Success - Documented Achievements
hero.description: 500+ successful residency cases across 16+ countries. With Counselor Montaser Haridy - the leading lawyer for foreigners in Egypt and the Arab world.

overview.title: Comprehensive Residency Solutions
overview.description: Counselor Montaser Haridy's office has achieved exceptional success in establishing legal residency files for foreigners in Egypt, becoming one of the first law offices specialized in supporting and protecting the rights of Arab and foreign residents with complete legal professionalism.

services.title: Our Residency Services
items: Medical treatment or family reunification residency
Residency for foreigners married to Egyptians
Residency for artists, journalists, and professionals
Legal solutions for expired residency or deportation cases

investor.title: Investor Residency in Egypt
investor.subtitle: #1 in Attracting Foreign Investors
investor.description: Specialized in facilitating procedures for Arab and foreign investor residency in Egypt through studied legal steps and strong network with relevant authorities.
services: Complete investment file preparation A to Z
Legal representation before Immigration and Investment Authority
Fast tax card and commercial registry extraction
Translation and legal authentication of foreign documents

why_choose: Documented expertise with Passport, Immigration & Nationality Department
Fast file preparation and application follow-up
Complete legal protection throughout all stages
Direct dealings with authorities without intermediaries
Confidentiality and professionalism in managing VIP investor files
